colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES BYIN RLABS DANG THUGS RJE'I GTER CHEN BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL PADMA DBANG CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I 'PHRIN LAS DANG 'BREL BAR SKONGS BSHAGS BYA TSUL GYI CHO GA RTZA GSUM DGYES SKONG DAG BYED BDUD RTZI ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, YONGS KYI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN RDO RJE 'DZIN PA MKHYEN RAB MTSAN CAN SOGS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS CHO GA SGRIGS 'KHYER BDE BA ZHIG CIS KYANG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL ZHING, RANG GZHAN MANG PO'I LAG LEN DU'ANG PHAN PAR BSAM NAS, SKONGS BSHAGS KYI GZHUNG BKA' GTER TSAD LDAN DU MA DANG, MKHAS SHING GRUB PA'I BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI PHYAG BZHES LA BRTEN NAS, RGYAS BSDUS 'TSAM ZHING 'JUG PA BDE BAR ^DGE SBYONG RIG PA 'DZIN PA DAM TSIG RDO RJES, LHA LDAN SBRUL PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG GI NYE 'DABS ZHIG TU BLA MA LHA LA TSOGS KYI 'KHOR LO'I MCHOD PA DANG BCAS GSOL BA BTAB STE, LEGS PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DAD BRTZON DAM TSIG DANG LDAN PA'I RDO RJE'I SLOB BU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG NAM MKHA' RDO RJE'O, ,'DIS KYANG BDAG GI TSE 'DI'I LUS BSKYED CING BSKYANGS PA'I DRIN CAN PHA MA GNYIS KYIS GTZO BYAS PA'I NAM MKHA'I MTHA' KHYAB KYI MA RGAN SEMS CAN THAMS CAD MYUR BA NYID DU SGRIB GNYIS BYANG ZHING TSOGS GNYIS RDZOGS TE, KHA SBYOR YAN LAG BDUN LDAN ZU 'JUG KUN BZANG RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GO 'PHANG BDE BLAG TU THOB PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
